Texts.Eng: A leaflet with information about AAE.

Texts.Chs:
除了载具和军用武器产品线外，AAE还为联盟城市和殖民地生产生活用品，工具，娱乐系统，甚至电网。

AAE始终展望未来，而我们所看到的未来的确是光明的。
Texts.Eng:
In addition to its line of vehicles and military-grade weapons, AAE also produces household items, tools, entertainment systems and even power grids for Union cities and colonies.

AAE always looks towards the future, and the future we see is a bright one indeed.

Texts.Chs: 流行的“赫利俄斯”突击步枪系列已迅速成为M-ASA士兵的标准装备，而“幻象”-5无人机则在军事和商业市场中广受欢迎。 AAE武器默认模式下备有配件导轨，允许其用户根据任何情况需要修改武器.
Texts.Eng: The popular Helios line of assault rifles has quickly become the standard equipment for M-ASA soldiers, while the Phantom-5 Drone enjoys popularity in both military and commercial markets. AAE weapons come equipped with attachment rails by default, allowing their users to modify weapons to the needs of any situation.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;埃癸先进工程：今日，工造未来.^reset;

AAE是埃癸先进工程（Advanced Aeginian Engineering）的缩写，是埃癸人邦联盟约（Aeginian Federal Union）的标志性制造商之一。 AAE负责制造许多联盟海军的标准武器和载具，除了快速和自动化生产外，还确保高质量的生产标准。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Advanced Aeginian Engineering - Engineering the Future, Today^reset;

AAE - an abbreviation of Advanced Aeginian Engineering - is one of the hallmark manufacturers of the Aeginian Federal Union. Responsible for manufacturing many of the Union Navy's standard weapons and vehicles, AAE ensures high-quality production standards in addition to fast and automated production.
